channel.title: Lemonday on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Lemonday on Rusland 1

item.title: Lemonday – I Sniff
item.description: Cold, cold, cold Words that are repeated: Я нюхаю я нюхаю я очень много нюхаю: I sniff, I sniff, I sniff a lot. Or I snuff, sniff, or smell a lot, in any case, something you do when it’s cold.
